plot outline: Katha Solla Porom is the story of 20 children who grow up in an orphanage far from the city, and long for the love of a mother. also chasing out the kidnapper who abduct newly born child from mother. This movie shows the heart of each orphanage kids and how lucky we are to have family. Movie is full of fun, nice touching dialogues.
title: Katha Solla Porom
plot: _Katha Solla Porom_ (qv) is the story of 20 children who grow up in an orphanage far from the city, and long for the love of a mother.

_Katha Solla Porom_ (qv) is the story of 20 children who grow up in an orphanage far from the city, and long for the love of a mother. also chasing out the kidnapper who abduct newly born child from mother. This movie shows the heart of each orphanage kids and how lucky we are to have family. Movie is full of fun, nice touching dialogues.::Arunkumar Muthukumarasamy
